description: The Opteka SteadyVid PRO is a video stabilizing system designed to reduce shake and stabilize video on cameras and camcorders weighing up to 5 lbs (2.26kg). The SteadyVid PRO features aluminum construction, adjustable mounting plate, comfort grip handle, super-smooth gimbal, sprit level and includes 2 removable weights in addition to the main counterweight.SpecificationsLoad Capacity:5 lbs (2.26kg)Construction:Aluminum Body, Rubber Padded Handle, Polished Chrome CounterweightsDimensions (LxHxD):8 x 9.5 x 1.2" (20.3 x 24.1 x 3 cm)Counterbalance Weights:1.15 lbs (515g) (1x 335g & 2x 90g weights)Weight (without counterweights):1.55 lbs (705g)Weight (with counterweights):2.68 lbs (1.22kg)Warranty:1 Year
title: Opteka SteadyVid PRO Video Stabilizer System for Digital Cameras, Camcorders and DSLR's (Supports up to 5 lbs)
